text: heolagdoen geos-i mueos-inya geudaee ge mudgeodeun joh-eun geosdeul-ila malhala ttohan hananim-ui galeuchim-e ttala yug sigdongmul-i neohuileul wihae sanyanghayeo on geosdo heolagdoen geos-igeoneul ineun ha nanim-i neohuiege galeuchin geos-ila hananim-ui ileum-eul yeom-wonhago hananim eul dulyeowohala hananim-eun gyesan-e ppaleusinila
